definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: appar. in Mesopot.;—´[[ת]]: 2Ki 19:12 = [[תְּלַשָָּׂר]] Is 37:12 (abode of [[בְּנֵי־עֶדֶן]] cf. As Til-ašuri (Esarhaddon) Dl:Par. 264 f.; near Edessa Wkl:Gesch. Bab. u. As. 269, 335 f.; v. Schr:KGF 199 f.; identification not certain, cf. Johns:Ency. Bib. TELASSAR.
